name: Wilson In The City
description:
A runner game that can take your free time and make it fun! Run as far as you can and collect as many crystals as you can!

This game helps to develop mindfulness, reaction, fine motor skills.

The player is greeted by the main and only location - the park, which constantly changes in a unique way over time. The player controls a running character, his task is to jump over various obstacles and collect crystals.

To make matters worse, the player's running speed increases over time. He can also speed up if he steps on a banana, but can also slow down if he steps on a puddle.

In addition, the game has the ability to change the character for which the player runs! You can do this in a separate menu "Store" by collecting the required number of crystals.

The game will be updated and improved over time.
